'''Torfi Frans Ólafsson''' is the Senior Creative Director of Entertainment at [[Mojang Studios]],<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref> known for serving as a producer on {{AMCM}}, its [[Untitled A Minecraft Movie sequel|sequel]], [[Untitled Minecraft animated series|Minecraft animated series]], and [https://www.imdb.com/pt/title/tt2004249/?ref_=nm_ov_bio_lk Hættulegur Hraði].
